title: (x) BAKUGAN Logo Font ID / bold caps w/ custom serifs - based on Aachen Bold {Victor}
content:
Hi:

Can anyone please ID this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109014144im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bakugan9_4844.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109014144im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bakugan9_3524.jpg)

Thanks!!

Q™ says: It's all about the Fonts!!
author: Qdzign.com.mx

comments.content:
It almost looks like somebody added serifs to a sans like Impact or Helvetica Compressed.

- Lex

Lex:

Yeah!! I actually used Aachen Bold, cropped the half serif endings and added another ones that would look much more like the ones in the sample...

Thanks anyway...

Q™ Says: It's All About The Fonts!
